name: BrainPickersCountrySongChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open Country Song Challenge”
”new song”
”skip song”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country song challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guess the song from the short preview you hear. You can guess the artist, title, or both for more points. The game is quick to get into and get out. Brush up on your music nostalgia and kill some time!

Features include:

- Hand curated tracks and Alexa can recognize the artist, title or both given at the same time!
- If you don't know the song, you can skip it!
 
***PREMIUM FEATURES***
- Your 20 song trial limit is removed and thousands of unique curated songs are available to guess.
- Song previews are doubled in length.
- You receive the ability to repeat the song preview.
- You receive the ability to save your favorites.
- You are able to hear or view your online code. You can then track your game progress and leaderboard online at our website, BrainPickers.co.uk
